column4: hmm, just discovered that I have no tty prompts , ctrl,alt,f1 gives a blank screen , ctrl,alt,f7 brings back the desktop. tho.... what's happening here ?
!tty
wasn't it a feature of LTS to upgrade directly into another lts?
agreed yes it's supposed to work, but unfortunately not in all cases ...the server editions seem to be ok
not sure but sounconverter might do that
unfortunatelly, it doesn't handle wma, as there is no plugin that could be installed to handle this type
read my post to ChesterX , above
too bad, I have all partner repos enabled. I guess I'll have to fetch some windows tool
http://linux.softpedia.com/get/Multimedia/Audio/soundKonverter-4695.shtml
great, there's even ppa for that! https://launchpad.net/~blca/+archive/published
nope, it doesn't handle it either. perhaps it only works with lossy wma
thanks for help anyway
same goes for you,\  have you installed ubuntu-restricted-extras ?
no, installing it right now

well, it messed pretty bad in my system, because I had some packages which I've compiled myself (like libavcodec and etc). also it installs openjdk (I have no idea why should it require that) and nspluginwrapper+flashplugin-installer
do you recon i actually need openjdk or it just considers it as a "restricted" and just installs it?
java is part of the package
I'm not a java expert , but for passive use it's requirement on webpages
but I already have sun-java
also, it is jdk and not jvm
dunno sorry
anyway, it is installed, will try now
the result is still the same - soundkonverter fails without even notifying me
